DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate in patients with T2DM and dyslipidemia not appropriately controlled with a statin and receiving metformin, the superiority of a fixed combination of fenofibrate and metformin vs metformin alone on TG and additionally, if the superiority on TG is established, to demonstrate the superiority on HDL-C
DOC.brief_title: Fenofibrate and Metformin Fixed Combination vs Metformin - FAME METFO
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patient with Type 2 Diabetes treated with stable dose of metformin and with dyslipidemia not appropriately controlled with a statin treatment. Exclusion Criteria Type 1 diabetes.
DOC.keyword: Treatment of Dyslipidemia and of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
